name: Happy 2022!
description:
Last year, I made "Happy 2021!" on December 31. This year I've put the last few weeks into making a new way to ring in the new year. Remember the year that was, enjoy a few jokes, and get hyped up for 2022 (as played through a system released in 1989).

I hope you like it, and have a safe and happy new year!

Browser Controls:

  • Arrow keys - move
  • Z - interact

A special thanks to both 0x72 and their 2BitCharactersGenerator (which is where the majority of sprites were sourced) and Chris Maltby and the GB Studio dev team. Thank you so much for offering your tools for new and aspiring devs!

(There is an option to pay for this game, and doing so would be supporting me in my future projects, but it's completely optional. I'm just happy anyone would come take a look. Thank you!)
